name: Open World Gangster Game
description:
This game is the real-life gangster simulator. You are the king of underworld gang mafia. You goal is to create your own criminal states, meet with people, provide them your services and make them allies. There are many guns and other weapons like Pistol, Machine Guns, Rifles, Sniper to choose from.

Run through city and find other gangster to eliminate them and collect money. Build your reputation with suppliers of drugs and ammunition.



Features:

√ Cool Graphics

√ Multiple Weapons

√ Multiple Gangster Costumes

√ Open World City

√ Drive Cars and Jeeps
